name: SilentE
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silent vowel
des:
Whether you are just learning to read English, teaching someone to read or helping someone recover after a break from reading English, this short an easy skill can help you remember and practice the pattern with a handful of words. If you answer the problems correctly, reward yourself (or you student) with an apple or a jelly bean.

Have fun!
